body:
Comment 2: 
There is a fix proposed in issue #7023 which will probably land soon. 

Given the age of the underlying bug, it is not clear if this will be fixed in Go 1.2.1,
or will wait til Go 1.3. Please comment on issue #7023 if it is critical that this be fix
soon.
_Status changed to **Duplicate**._ _Merged into issue #7023._
